ComicInfo.Series: Star Wars: Purge - Seconds to Die
ComicInfo.Summary: Seconds to Die: Plo Koon's nephew tries to avenge the Jedis' deaths at the hands of the Clone Troopers and Anakin Skywalker.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-11 19:19:20. [CVDB182725] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 09:22:04. [Issue ID 682499]
